A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not sure why there’s so much hate. As someone who found The Force Awakens to be pretty bland\, I really liked the direction this one went in. In the end (no spoilers)\, it’s likely hard to see what exactly was accomplished. But I think that’s part of the point. Not everything always works in your favor. Sometimes progress is made\, sometimes we’re impeded in our goals. Shifting minds will make for an interesting third installment\, no doubt.
